channel.title: Disconnecting s**t is getting on my nerves
channel.description:
Yo hey i got a question from wat ive seen of thisits really fun but every time i get on i play for like 10-15 seconds then says connection error and i get dced then i try and log back in and dont work only lets me log into a new server and then only for 10-15 seconds till i get dced coul somone possible tell me the source of this problem and possible post a solution.
And a note to creators of moparscape YOU ALL ROCK URS IS EVEN COOLER THAN RS I LOVE YOU(now if only i could play for more than 10 seconds)[br][size=1]Posted on: January 01, 2007, 11:44:02 PM[/size][hr]bump

item.title: Disconnecting s**t is getting on my nerves
item.dc:creator: @Kingturd Kingturd
item.description:
@Kingturd wrote:

Having the latest JDE and JDK helps a lot. Also, if you have a lot of crap downloaded, it might help to get rid of some of it. If you need a stable server, try evolvedscape.no-ip.info, port 43594. If you get d/c’d on that, its your internet connection and you have too much crap downloaded.

~Kingturd

Read full topic
